EventsById.description: Gets event data by a list of event IDs and optional calendar ID to filter.

props.name: eventIds
props.description: Comma separated list of event IDs (e.g. '536,525,506,535'). When at least one ID doesn't exist the whole query return a 404 error.

onEventChanged.description: Triggers when an event is added or updated.

onChangedData.description: Triggers when anything was added, updated or deleted since last request.
